definition: low/beneath/to lower (one's head)/to let droop/to hang down/to incline

height/altitude (aviation)/pitch (music)/ups and downs (success or failure)/whether sth is right or wrong/comparative strength, weight, depth, stature/(spoken interjection) anyway, whatever/eventually, in the end
valley/trough (as opposed to peaks)/fig. low point/lowest ebb/nadir of one's fortunes
to bow the head/to yield/to give in

sentences.english: China's fertility rate may be much lower than official estimates.
sentences.chinese: 中国人口高增长率可能会比政府估计的要低很多。

sentences.english: I think the EDG probably uses a low astigmatism eyepiece design like the SE.
sentences.chinese: 我想EDG可能使用了象SE一样的低像散目镜设计。

sentences.english: The exchange rate fluctuates every day.
sentences.chinese: 今天的汇率比昨天稍微低一点儿。

sentences.english: Accelerators are generally used in near-surface applications in which the temperature is relatively low.
sentences.chinese: 速凝剂一般在温度相对较低的接近地面的情况下使用。

sentences.english: But developers have little incentive to build less-profitable units for low-income households.
sentences.chinese: 但开发商不愿为低收入家庭建造低利润的单元房。

sentences.english: A low-solids mud in which there is no clay deflocculant chemical.
sentences.chinese: 不含粘土解絮凝化学剂的低固相泥浆。

sentences.english: Cell suspension was collected, and then stained after hypotonic treatment.
sentences.chinese: 收集细胞悬液，再经低渗处理后滴片染色。

sentences.english: No taxes on IBCs; low tax rate for domestic companies.
sentences.chinese: 没有税，国内公司低税率。

sentences.english: H+N+S Landscape Architects: The Netherlands forms the low-lying delta of North-Western Europe.
sentences.chinese: 荷兰位于欧洲西北部的三角洲地区，地势较低。

sentences.english: When the pressure gets low the boiling-point becomes low.
sentences.chinese: 如果大气压力低，沸点就低。

sentences.english: When the pressure gets low the boiling-point becomes low.
sentences.chinese: 如果大气压力低，沸点就低。

sentences.english: The meditator in the photograph is sitting too low.
sentences.chinese: 图中的冥想者坐得太低。

sentences.english: It was low growing, with a bow just high enough to catch her.
sentences.chinese: 它是低增长，只是高要抓住她的弓。

sentences.english: It can indicate ink low and ink finish.
sentences.chinese: 具有墨量低和墨尽提示功能。

sentences.english: Regular maintenance work of the low cost.
sentences.chinese: 经常性的维修保养工作费用较低。
“低能力者受制于其虚幻的优越感”。

definition: to be on the low side/to be inadequate (e.g. of a salary)
to be on the high side/to be unusually high
weak/feeble/young/inferior/(following a decimal or fraction) slightly less than
range (the difference between the lowest and highest values)
to decline/to drop/to fall/to go down/to decrease
difference/discrepancy/to differ/error/to err/to make a mistake
to differ from/to fall short of/lacking/wrong/inferior/Taiwan pr. [cha1]
strong/powerful/better/slightly more than/vigorous/violent/best in their category, e.g. see 百強|百强[bai3 qiang2]
to force/to compel/to strive/to make an effort
